info.title: ReciFEED API - Monolith
info.description: The monolith section of a hybrid microservices-monolith API forming the ReciFEED website app's backend.

get.summary: Returns a base monolith API descriptor object.

200.description: Returns a summary of API endpoints (static).

get.summary: Returns a health check of the monolith.

200.description: Returns a success message, with timestamp.

get.summary: Returns a list of all users (sans passwords), paginated.

200.description: Returns a success message with time.

401.description: Authentication error, no valid bearer token, returns error object.

get.summary: Returns a single user by ID (sans password).

put.summary: Updates a user by ID. If username changes, cascades update to all posts, comments, likes, and reviews.

post.summary: Authenticates a user with email and password, returns JWT token.

200.description: Login successful, returns JWT token and user info.

example.message: Email and password required for login.

get.summary: Validates a JWT token and returns decoded user information.

requestBody.description: Token is passed via Authorization header, not request body.

200.description: Token is valid, returns decoded user data.

400.description: Missing required fields or user already exists.

value.message: Please provide email, password, and username
User with this email already exists

get.summary: Searches across all entities (recipes, users, posts) with a single query.

200.description: Returns search results from all entities.

posts.body: Just made the best pasta dish!

get.summary: Searches recipes by query, tags, and/or cooking time. All parameters optional.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string for title, tags, or ingredients (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter by

get.summary: Searches users by username or email.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string for username or email (case-insensitive)

200.description: Returns matching users (up to 50, sans passwords).

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string for post body content (case-insensitive)

posts.body: Fresh Greek salad for lunch. Loved it!

get.summary: Returns a paginated list of all recipes with sorting options.

401.description: Authentication error, no valid bearer token.

delete.summary: Deletes a review from a recipe and recalculates average rating.

200.description: Review successfully deleted with updated stats.

get.summary: Returns all available filter options (unique tags and cooking times from all recipes).

200.description: Returns unique tags and cooking times.

cookingTimes.description: Sorted array of unique cooking times

get.summary: Filters recipes by tags and/or exact cooking time.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter by (matches any)

parameters.name: cooking_time
parameters.description: Exact cooking time string to filter by

get.summary: Returns a single recipe by ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a review from a recipe and recalculates average rating.

200.description: Review successfully deleted with updated stats.

get.summary: Returns a paginated feed of all posts with sorting options. Automatically updates usernames from current user data.

200.description: Returns paginated post feed with updated usernames.

posts.body: Just made an amazing pasta dish!

get.summary: Returns all posts by a specific user, paginated.

posts.body: Just made an amazing pasta dish!

get.summary: Returns a single post by ID.

data.body: Just made an amazing pasta dish!

post.summary: Adds a like to a post. Users cannot like the same post twice.

userId.description: User ID of person liking the post

400.description: Validation error or post already liked.

delete.summary: Removes a like from a post.

userId.description: User ID of person unliking the post

400.description: Validation error or post was not liked.

value.message: Post was not liked by this user

500Error.description: Internal error, returns appropriate error response.

401TokenError.description: Authentication error, no valid bearer token.

bearerAuth.description: Required for most all endpoints in this API (sans login, user create, user validate, checks). Received from a valid ```/login``` response.
